(ROOT
  (S
    (S
      (NP
        (NP (DT The) (NN collecting))
        (PP (IN of)
          (NP (NNS wines))))
      (VP (VBZ has)
        (ADVP (RB really))
        (VP (VBN taken)
          (PRT (RP off))
          (PP (IN in)
            (NP (NNP Singapore)))
          (PP (IN over)
            (NP (DT the) (JJ last) (NN decade)
              (CC or)
              (RB so))))))
    (CC and)
    (S
      (NP (PRP I))
      (VP (VBP am)
        (ADJP (JJ sure)
          (SBAR
            (S
              (NP
                (NP (JJ many))
                (PP (IN of)
                  (NP (PRP us))))
              (VP (MD will)
                (VP (VB have)
                  (NP
                    (NP (DT a) (JJ few) (NNS bottles))
                    (VP (VBG lying)
                      (PRT (RP around))
                      (ADVP
                        (NP (DT the) (NN house))
                        (RB somewhere)))))))))))
    (. .)))


det(collecting-2, The-1)
nsubj(taken-7, collecting-2)
prep(collecting-2, of-3)
pobj(of-3, wines-4)
aux(taken-7, has-5)
advmod(taken-7, really-6)
root(ROOT-0, taken-7)
prt(taken-7, off-8)
prep(taken-7, in-9)
pobj(in-9, Singapore-10)
prep(taken-7, over-11)
det(decade-14, the-12)
amod(decade-14, last-13)
pobj(over-11, decade-14)
cc(decade-14, or-15)
advmod(decade-14, so-16)
cc(taken-7, and-17)
nsubj(sure-20, I-18)
cop(sure-20, am-19)
conj(taken-7, sure-20)
nsubj(have-25, many-21)
prep(many-21, of-22)
pobj(of-22, us-23)
aux(have-25, will-24)
ccomp(sure-20, have-25)
det(bottles-28, a-26)
amod(bottles-28, few-27)
dobj(have-25, bottles-28)
partmod(bottles-28, lying-29)
prt(lying-29, around-30)
det(house-32, the-31)
npadvmod(somewhere-33, house-32)
advmod(lying-29, somewhere-33)


(ROOT
  (FRAG
    (ADVP (RB However))
    (ADVP (RB ,))))


root(ROOT-0, However-1)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (EX there))
    (VP (VBP are)
      (NP
        (NP (CD two) (JJ main) (NNS problems))
        (PP (IN with)
          (NP
            (NP (VBG collecting) (NNS wines))
            (PP (IN in)
              (NP (NNP Singapore)))))))
    (. .)))


expl(are-2, there-1)
root(ROOT-0, are-2)
num(problems-5, two-3)
amod(problems-5, main-4)
nsubj(are-2, problems-5)
prep(problems-5, with-6)
amod(wines-8, collecting-7)
pobj(with-6, wines-8)
prep(wines-8, in-9)
pobj(in-9, Singapore-10)


(ROOT
  (NP
    (NP (DT The) (NN lack))
    (PP (IN of)
      (NP
        (NP (NN space))
        (, ,)))))


det(lack-2, The-1)
root(ROOT-0, lack-2)
prep(lack-2, of-3)
pobj(of-3, space-4)


(ROOT
  (FRAG
    (ADVP (RB as) (RB well))
    (NP (RB as) (DT the) (JJ hot) (NN weather))
    (. .)))


advmod(well-2, as-1)
dep(weather-6, well-2)
advmod(weather-6, as-3)
det(weather-6, the-4)
amod(weather-6, hot-5)
root(ROOT-0, weather-6)
